option.name: preConfigureCommands
option.value: # Compiler and flags CC = gcc CFLAGS = -Wall -Wextra -std=c99 -pedantic # Executable name EXECUTABLE = compiler # Source files SRCS = main.c scanner.c parser.c expression.c symtable.c symstack.c linlist.c generator.c error.c # Object files (auto-generated) OBJS = $(SRCS:.c=.o) # Linking rule $(EXECUTABLE): $(OBJS) $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -o $@ $^ -lm # Compilation rule %.o: %.c $(CC) $(CFLAGS) -c $< -o $@ # Clean rule clean: rm -f $(OBJS) $(EXECUTABLE)
